content:
# Factorio Agent Report - Steps 0-39

## EXISTING STRUCTURES

### Steam Power Generation at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5) to (x=0.5, y=6.5)
Generates electricity using steam power.
Consists of:
- Offshore Pump at (x=-9.5, y=-0.5)
- Boiler at (x=-5.0, y=2.5) (Currently out of fuel)
- Steam Engine at (x=0.5, y=6.5)
- PipeGroup connecting pump to boiler (x=-8.5, y=-0.5) to (x=-5.5, y=0.5)
- PipeGroup connecting boiler to steam engine (x=-3.5, y=3.5) to (x=-2.5, y=6.5)

### Crude Oil Extraction and Processing
Extracts crude oil and processes it into petroleum gas, which is then used to create plastic bars.
Consists of:
- PumpJack at (x=17.5, y=40.5) extracting crude oil.
- StorageTank at (x=25.5, y=43.5) storing crude oil.
- OilRefinery at (x=30.5, y=63.5) processing crude oil into petroleum gas.
- StorageTank at (x=40.5, y=66.5) storing petroleum gas.
- ChemicalPlant at (x=37.5, y=72.5) set to produce plastic bars (requires coal and petroleum gas).
- Inserter at (x=35.5, y=72.5) intended to feed coal into the Chemical Plant.
- PipeGroup connecting PumpJack to Oil Refinery via Storage Tank (x=19.5, y=38.5) to (x=31.5, y=67.5).
- PipeGroup connecting Oil Refinery to Chemical Plant via Storage Tank (x=33.5, y=60.5) to (x=39.5, y=74.5).
- ElectricityGroup connecting the PumpJack, Oil Refinery, Chemical Plant, and Inserter (multiple poles, e.g., x=33.5, y=64.5 to x=15.5, y=39.5). (Currently not powered due to boiler being out of fuel).

### Coal Mining Setup (New)
A single electric mining drill placed on a coal patch.
Consists of:
- Electric Mining Drill at (x=29.5, y=18.5) (Currently has no power).

### Belt Transport Remnants
